roleset.name: to make famous

example.name: Adjectival usage, most common
example.text: The places renowned *NONE* for breeding bunco , like the Miami neighborhood known as the `` Maggot Mile '' and Las Vegas 's flashy strip of casinos , invariably offer fast cars , high rollers , glamorous women and lots of sunshine .
example.arg: like the Miami neighborhood known as the `` Maggot Mile '' and Las Vegas 's flashy strip of casinos

example.name: Active, rare
example.text: He renowned the extreme power of Hilot Grand Master Gloria Blancia Thirnish .
example.arg: the extreme power of Hilot Grand Master Gloria Blancia Thirnish .

roleset.note: RENOWN-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire; comparison to fame.01. (from renown.01-v)
RENOWNED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from renowned.01-j)
